title: nAnu bEra
sahitya:
nAnu bEra mADuve enna nAligeyembo ettanErikoNDu


caraNam 1    tanuvembOdE ondu gONiyalli rAmanAmavembo saraku tumbi koNDu
    caraNam 2    indriyangaLemba sangadavaraDDa bandare mukunda mudreya tOrisi hoDedADi
    caraNam 3    acalAnanda purandara viTTalanalli pOgi pracura bhaktiyanittu muktiya paDedu
